Biography

Honors and Awards

• 2023 ABCA/Rawlings All-Atlantic Region First Team

• 2023 D2CCA All-Atlantic Region Second Team

• 2023 NCBWA All-Atlantic Region Second Team

• 2023 CSC Academic All-District

• 2023 First Team All-PSAC East

• 2023 NCBWA Preseason All-Atlantic Team Honorable Mention

• 2022 Second Team All-PSAC East

• 2022 NCBWA Atlantic Region Hitter of the Week (March 15)

• 2022 PSAC Athlete of the Week (March 14)

2023: Appeared and started in all 45 games ... gained first team All-PSAC East honors as he batted a team-best .395 with a team-high 66 hits in 167 at-bats ... drove in a team-best 51 runs and scored 47 ... added a team-best 18 doubles and a team-best 11 home runs ... his .701 slugging percentage topped the team ... drew 22 walks and was hit-by-pitch 10 times to tie Cole Daugherty for the team lead ... was 12-of-13 in stolen bases ... posted a .987 fielding percentage in 297 chances ... garnered CSC Academic All-District honors ... named to NCBWA All-Atlantic Region second team squad.

2022: Appeared in 41 games with 40 starts ... batted .356 with a team-best 53 hits in 149 at-bats ... drove in a team-best 43 runs and scored 26 ... topped the team in home runs (13), doubles (14), sacrifice flies (4), total bases (106), slugging percentage (.441) and OPS (1.116) ... posted a .993 fielding percentage in 302 chances ... named PSAC East Athlete of the Week for March 14 ... named NCBWA Atlantic Region Hitter of the Week for March 16.

Prior to Shepherd: A 2018 graduate of University High School where he played baseball for Donovan Riggleman ... lettered four years in baseball ... a two-year letterwinner in golf ...named 2018 Gatorade Player of the Year and OVAC Player of the Year ... was a first team All-State, first team All-Conference, and a Perfect Game All-American ... posted a .472 batting average with 11 home runs and 44 runs batted in ... a transfer from Gardner-Webb ... also attended LaSalle.

Personal: The son of Debbie and James Mulhall ... majoring in business administration.
